      • signWithDomainKey

        public void signWithDomainKey(String domain,
                     String selector,
                     String privateKey)
        Primes this email for signing with a DKIM domain key. Actual signing is done when sending using a Mailer.

        Also see: 

          
     
        • https://postmarkapp.com/guides/dkim
          • 
     
        • https://github.com/markenwerk/java-utils-mail-dkim
          • 
     
        • http://www.gettingemaildelivered.com/dkim-explained-how-to-set-up-and-use-domainkeys-identified-mail-effectively
          • 
     
        • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DomainKeys_Identified_Mail
          •
        Parameters:
        privateKey - DKIM private key content used to sign for the sending party.
        domain - The domain being authorized to send.
        selector - Additional domain specifier.

      • isApplyDKIMSignature

        public boolean isApplyDKIMSignature()

        public String toString()
